channel.title: Anchorage on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Anchorage on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Simon and Seaford Saloon
item.description: Summary In Anchorage, there is this spot that for some reason got a lot of good Yelp reviews. Usually when you venture outside of the major cities in the U.S., you have lower expectations on the taste of food. Of course in Alaska, we’d expect high quality seafood. The cioppino was delicious. The bowl that it came in was huge, and the clams/fish/shrimp were all pretty tasty. The clam chowder was also good too.
